## Reading in the Data

```{r}
set.seed(123)
train_size <- floor(0.80 * nrow(application_train))
train_indices <- sample(seq_len(nrow(application_train)), size = train_size)
train_data <- application_train[train_indices, ]
val_data <- application_train[-train_indices, ]
```
